android-cloexec-inotify-init.description:
Description

The usage of
inotify_init()
is not recommended, itâ€™s better to use
inotify_init1()
.

Examples:

inotify_init
();
// becomes
inotify_init1
(
IN_CLOEXEC
);
android-cloexec-inotify-init.option:
Static analysis (Clang-Tidy) options are configured via .clang-tidy file.

This rule has no specific options.
